nycTheatreExcerpt: Suffs is enthralling, a smart, funny and beautifully sung musical that brings its chosen moment in history to life just as surely and confidently as Hamilton did for its. That the Suffs era is female-focused and so less known, in its details, to the general public than the doings of the Founding Fathers makes Shaina Taub's creation all the more potent.
